title: Bernice Burgos Interview and More
itunes:title: Bernice Burgos Interview and More
description:
Wednesday 7/26 - Today on the show we had every man's favorite "Women's Crush Wednesday" Bernice Burgos come on the show, where she cleared the rumors with who she is and not dating and more. In addition, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a social media stuntman who got arrested in Dunkin' Donuts for trying to steal a tray of donuts. Also, Angela helped some listeners with their relationships during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
